snippet: The “wise men” were  chosen by President Giorgio Napolitano to help break the stalemate over forming a new governing coaliton.
abstract: Advisers chosen by Italian Pres Giorgio Napolitano to help solve country's political stalemate present their findings, listing political and economic changes needed.
lead_paragraph: The “wise men” were  chosen by President Giorgio Napolitano to help break the stalemate over forming a new governing coaliton.

headline.seo: Advisers Urge Changes to Break Stalemate in Italy
headline.main: Advisers Urge Political Changes in Italy to Break Stalemate
headline.print_headline: Italy: Advisers Aim to Break Stalemate
